mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rqb_package_info( user_id, package_id, package_amount, start_amount, start_time, end_time, is_use, is_valid, channel_from, create_by, create_date ) VALUES( #{userId}, get_full_seq_nextval('PI','rqb_package_info_package_id'), #{packageAmount}, #{startAmount}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, 'N', 'Y', 'recommend', 'SYSTEM', now() )
